chapter.title: Recent Documentation Changes
chapter.para: This section describes recent and important changes in the &sleposreg; documentation.

listitem.para: Added a chapter on booting 64-bit client images. See . (2016-11-15)
Added a chapter on creating 64-bit client images. See . (2016-11-15)
The description of the &slepos; XML format has been updated. See . (2012-10-02)
The chapter describing the posAdmin XML interface has been updated. Modification of the existing LDAP data using XML is now possible. See and . (2012-12-05)
The section on querying LDAP objects has been updated. See . (2012-12-05)

The section on initializing LDAP database has been updated. &slepos; can now coexist with existing LDAP databases. &admserv; now uses YaST CA Management interface for issuing and managing SSL See . (2013-05-07)
A description of a new script for creating directory structure on service partition for offline boot was added. See . (2013-05-07)
A new section on booting special images (for example for BIOS update) was added. See . (2013-05-07)
A new section on creating images for booting and offline installation from USB flash drives was added. See . (2013-05-07)
A new section about using external tools for LDAP database modification and the new posAdmin --refresh feature was added. See . (2013-05-10)
Dmraid fake raid controllers are now supported. See . (2013-08-1)
The attribute scLastBootTime of scWorkstation object is used to store time of last boot. It is now possible to delete workstations according to the time and date of the last boot. See . (2013-08-1)
The section has been updated. (2013-08-1)
The posLDIFReport script has been added. See . (2013-08-1)
The section has been updated. (2013-08-1)
The section has been updated. (2013-08-1)
The section has been updated. (2013-08-1)
The section has been updated. (2013-08-1)
The section has been added. (2013-08-1)
The section has been updated. (2013-08-1)
